verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Zophar|strong="H6691"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Naamathite|strong="H5284"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*:

“\w Should|strong="H8193"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* stream \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w go|strong="H6030"\w* \w unanswered|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w such|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* speaker \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w vindicated|strong="H6663"\w*?

Should \w your|strong="H4962"\w* babbling put others \w to|strong="H2790"\w* \w silence|strong="H2790"\w*? \w Will|strong="H4962"\w* you \w scoff|strong="H3932"\w* without \w rebuke|strong="H3637"\w*?

\w You|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* said, ‘\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w doctrine|strong="H3948"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* sound, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w Your|strong="H1961"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* if only \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w and|strong="H2451"\w* disclose \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w secrets|strong="H8587"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* true \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w two|strong="H3718"\w* \w sides|strong="H3718"\w*. \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H2451"\w* exacts \w from|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* deserves.

Can \w you|strong="H5704"\w* fathom \w the|strong="H5704"\w* deep \w things|strong="H2714"\w* \w of|strong="H2714"\w* God \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w discover|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w limits|strong="H8503"\w* \w of|strong="H2714"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*?

\w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* higher \w than|strong="H6013"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*—\w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w*? \w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* \w than|strong="H6013"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*—\w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w Their|strong="H4480"\w* \w measure|strong="H4055"\w* \w is|strong="H4055"\w* longer \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth \w and|strong="H3220"\w* wider \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2498"\w* \w He|strong="H7725"\w* comes along \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w imprison|strong="H5462"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*, \w or|strong="H4310"\w* convenes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* court, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w stop|strong="H5462"\w* \w Him|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w deceit|strong="H7723"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w*. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* iniquity, \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3045"\w* \w note|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* witless man can no \w more|strong="H3205"\w* \w become|strong="H3205"\w* \w wise|strong="H3823"\w* than \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w colt|strong="H5895"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* \w donkey|strong="H6501"\w* can be \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man!\f + \fr 11:12 \ft Or can be born tame\f*

\w As|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w you|strong="H3820"\w*, if \w you|strong="H3820"\w* \w direct|strong="H3559"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* lift \w up|strong="H6566"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w Him|strong="H3559"\w*,

if \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w put|strong="H7368"\w* \w away|strong="H7368"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* allow no \w injustice|strong="H5766"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* tents,

\w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* shame; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w stand|strong="H3372"\w* \w firm|strong="H3332"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* unafraid.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w misery|strong="H5999"\w*, recalling \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w gone|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H1961"\w* \w life|strong="H2465"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brighter|strong="H6965"\w* than \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*; \w its|strong="H1961"\w* darkness \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3426"\w* \w be|strong="H3426"\w* secure, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*, \w and|strong="H7901"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3426"\w* \w look|strong="H2658"\w* \w around|strong="H2658"\w* \w and|strong="H7901"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* safety.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w lie|strong="H7257"\w* \w down|strong="H7257"\w* \w without|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* court \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w favor|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w escape|strong="H4498"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* elude \w them|strong="H3615"\w*; \w they|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* \w last|strong="H4646"\w* \w breath|strong="H5315"\w*.”
